text:
e="preserve">Dearon Thompson (March 10, 1965 – January 7, 2021), known professionally as Deezer D, was an American actor, rapper, and motivational speaker. Thompson was born in Los Angeles, California. He was best known for his role as Nurse Malik McGrath in the American medical television series "ER". He was also in the movies "CB4" and "Fear of a Black Hat".
Thompson died on January 7, 2021 at the age of 55.
